channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Recovery

item.title: CVE-2022-27840|2024-08-03T05:41:09.882Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20recovery
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in SamsungRecovery prior to version 8.1.43.0 allows local attckers to delete arbitrary files as SamsungRecovery permission.
